Sentencas: An improved design of fuel cells stacks arrangement has been suggested before for MCFC where reactant streams are ducted such that they are fed and recycled among multiple MCFC stacks in series.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: By networking fuel cell stacks, increased efficiency, improved thermal balance, and higher total reactant utilisation can be achieved.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: In this study, a combination of networked solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks and a gas turbine (GT) has been modelled and analysed.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: In such a combination, the stacks are operating in series with respect to the fuel flow.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: In previous studies conducted on hybrid SOFC/GT cycles by the authors, it was shown that the major part of the output of such cycles can be addressed to the fuel cell, In those studies, a single SOFC with parallel gas flows to individual cells were assumed.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: It can be expected that if the performance of the fuel cell is enhanced by networking, the overall system performance will improve.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: In the first part of this paper, the benefit of the networked stacks is demonstrated for a stand alone stack while the second part analyses and discusses the impact networking of the stacks has on the SOFC/GT system performance and design.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle

Sentencas: For stacks with both reactant streams in series, a significant increase of system efficiency was found (almost 5% points), which, however, can be explained mainly by an improved thermal management.
Titulo: Networked solid oxide fuel cell stacks combined with a gas turbine cycle
